landing.baseline: An open project to bring people together
landing.presentation: Sea of Bottles is an open source project. The main goal of this project is to bring people together by throwing message bottles into the sea.

presentation-bottle.title: Message Bottle
presentation-bottle.description: You can write a message and throw it into the sea. Maybe someone will receive it...

presentation-sailor.title: Sailor
presentation-sailor.description: You can become a Sailor and receive messages from the sea.

create-bottle.title: Send a Bottle
create-bottle.description: Add a message in a Bottle and throw it into the Sea!

success.create-bottle-option-description: You have throw the Bottle into the Sea! Maybe someone, someday will open it.
success.create-sailor-option-description: Do you want to be able to be able to receive bottles from the Sea?

create-sailor.title: Become a Sailor
create-sailor.description: You can become a Sailor to be able to receive Bottles from the Sea. All you need is an email to receive them!

success.create-bottle-option-description: You may receive Bottles from the Sea. Do you want to throw one?

delete-sailor.title: Unsubscribe
delete-sailor.description: Do you want to receive no more message? You can leave the Sea!
